post.body: I'm trying to maintain a Twitter presence so that I don't entirely lose my wife and become a Twitter widower! Ah, you never know...
I am making a promise to myself to get YourPianoCoach started. I think the key is to make small, doable goals and check them off every day.
Grant, my 8 year old no longer believes in Santa, however Max, the 7 year old still does. I'm staying neutral!
Sitting on my coach trying to finish up appraisal files from Friday, and feeling tired from a full day of preaching at our church.
Feeling very tired from my early morning run and my distant real estate appraisal on a manufactured home in the country.
#votereport everything is #good in #47804 no lines and #wait:0
I am typing up a real estate appraisal, that I drove by today. I'm also listening to Jazz on Pandora.
